TextLibrary.Text: Prevents your opponents Shields from regenerating for 6 turns.
Gives you the Boost effect (doubles all Yellow Energy) for 6 turns.
Does 5 points of damage to your opponent.
Opponents Gravity rotates constantly for 6 turns.
Destroys all Gems of matching color to the one chosen. You gain full effect for all Gems destroyed.
Gives you the Auxiliary Armor effect (causing each non-damage match to reinforce your Shields but award -1 less of that Gem Type) for 6 turns.
Removes every Mine on the board. You gain no effect for Gems destroyed.
Gives you the Targeting effect (+3 to all Damage done) for 5 turns, +1 turn for every 5 points of Red Energy you have.
Inflicts the Destabilization effect on your opponent (allowing their Shields to let up to 5 points of damage through) for 6 turns.
Adds +5 to your Shield Energy. Does not end your turn.
Adds +5 to your Red Energy. Does not end your turn.
Repairs +5 damage, +1 more for every 8 points of Green Energy you have.
Adds 8 to Shield Energy, +1 more for every 8 points of Red Energy your opponent has.
Does 4 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 5 points of Red Energy you have.
Does 8 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 3 points of Red Energy you have.
Does 2 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every Yellow Gem on the board.
Destroys a single Gem of your choice on the board. You gain full effect for the Gem destroyed.
Removes all Mines on the board. Adds +1 Red Energy for each Mine removed and drains that amount from your opponent.
Removes all Blue Gems on the board. Adds +1 to your Shield for every 2 Gems removed.
Repairs 8 damage, +1 more for every 4 Green Gems on the board. Drains your Green Energy.
Removes all Status Effects on your ship.
Removes all Status Effects on the board. Does not end your turn.
Removes all Status Effects in play.
Does 1 point of damage to your opponent for every 2 points in your Shield. Drains your Shield to half.
Drains 1-10 Psi points randomly from your Psi total, doing 1 point of damage to the opponent for every point drained.
Destroys all Purple Gems on the board and adds +1 to your Shield for every 2 Gems destroyed.
Select a Gem. Changes all Gems of matching color into Purple Gems.
Does 5 points of damage to your opponent, +2 for every 15 points in your Gunnery Skill (Max: +24)
Converts all Yellow Gems into Red Gems.
Converts all Yellow Gems into Green Gems.
Passive, Adds 15 to maximum Red Energy + 1 for each 30 points of Gunnery you have.
Randomly adds 4 Yellow Gems to the board, +1 more for every 15 points of Engineering Skill you have (maximum of +10).
Destroys all White Gems on the board. You gain +1 Intel for every 2 Gems destroyed.
Adds +10 to your maximum Red Energy for the remainder of this Battle and reduces the Red Energy of your opponent to 0.
Passive, Adds 10 to maximum Yellow Energy, +1 more for every 30 points of Engineer you have.
Passively adds 10 points of Shields +1 more for every 30 points of Pilot Skill you have.
Passively adds 10 points of Shields +1 more for every 8 levels you have.
Passively increases your maximum Red Energy by 25 +1 more for every 40 Points of Gunnery Skill you have.
Passively increases your maximum Yellow and Green Energy by 10 +1 more for every 40 points of Engineer you have.
Passively increases your maximum Green Energy by 15 + 1 more for every 40 points of Science you have.
Passively increases your maximum Shields by 5 + 1 more for every 40 points of Pilot you have.
Cloaks your ship for 10 turns so you take no damage. The cloak ends if you damage your opponent.
Passively increases your maximum Red, Yellow and Green Energy by 15 + 1 for every 250 PSI you have (max +10.)
Increases your maximum Shield Energy by 20 and increases your Shield by 10.
Passively increases your maximum Red Energy and Green Energy by 20 +1 more for every 250 PSI you have (max +10.)
Passively increases your maximum Red and Yellow Energy by 10 +1 more for every 20 points of Science you have.
Applies Gravity to the board for 8 turns (causing Gems to fall downwards). Does not end your turn.
Applies Anti-Gravity to the board for 5 turns (causing Gems to fall upwards). Does not end your turn.
Applies the Grav-Flux effect to the board for 5 turns (causing Gems to fall from random directions). Does not end your turn.
Applies the Gas Nebula effect to the board for 8 turns (causing all Energy matches to double in effect). Does not end your turn.
Applies the Minefield effect to the board for 8 turns (causing all damage Gems to double in effect). Does not end your turn.
Destroys all Mines on the board. For each Mine destroyed, it adds +2 to maximum Red Energy (for the rest of this Battle).
Destroys all White Gems on the board. For each Gem destroyed, it adds 1 to your Green Energy.
Destroys all Purple Gems on the board. For every Gem destroyed, it adds +1 to your Psi points.
Drains up to 8 points of Yellow Energy from your opponent, adding them to your own.
Drains up to 10 Shield Energy from your opponent, adding them to your own Shield Energy.
Halves all of your opponents Energy (Excluding Shields).
All of your opponents Energy is reduced to 0 (Shields reduced by half).
Halves the Green Energy of your opponent.
Explodes a random Gem. All Gems surrounding it are destroyed. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
All +10 Mines on the board explode, destroying the surrounding Gems. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
All +1 Mines on the board explode destroying the surrounding Gems. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
All Green Gems on the board explode, destroying the surrounding Gems. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
Select a Gem. The chosen Gem and all Gems surrounding it are destroyed. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
Activates a Shield Drone on your ship for 5 turns (causing your Shield to regenerate 4 points at the start of each turn).
Activates an Interceptor Drone on your ship for 5 turns (causing all incoming damage of +3 or greater to be reduced by 5 points).
Activates a Chronotron Drone on your ship for 5 turns (causing any Time Warp effects that make you miss a turn to be deleted automatically).
Activates a Guardian Drone on your ship for 5 turns (causing all damage to be halved if your Shield Energy is greater than 0).
Passively increases your maximum Red and Green Energy by 10, +1 more for every 20 points of Engineer you have.
Increases your maxmium Yellow Energy for this battle by 5 + 1 more for every 4 Yellow Energy you have.
Passively increases your maximum Yellow Energy by 15, + 1 more for every 40 points of Engineer you have.
Increases all maximum Energy (except Shield Energy) by +3. Does not end your turn.
Increases your maximum Shield Energy by 20, +1 more for every 3 Blue Gems on the board. Destroys all Blue Gems in play.
Adds 4 turns to the Recharge Time of a random opponent Item.
Adds 2 turns to the Recharge Time of all opponent Items, +1 more for every 10 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Adds 3 turns to the Recharge Time of the most powerful Item on the opponents ship (Item with the highest Energy cost).
Adds 2 turns to the Recharge Time of a random opponent Item. Does not end your turn.
Adds 4 turns to the Recharge Time of a random opponent Item. Adds 1 more Item for every 50 points in your Gunnery Skill.
Causes the opponent to lose 10% of their Cargo.
Inflicts the Time Warp effect on the opponent (causing them to miss turns) for 2 turns, +1 turn for every 10 Yellow Energy you have.
Inflicts the Shield Drain effect on your opponent (causing their Shield to lose 4 points each turn) for 4 turns, +1 turn for every 5 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Inflicts the Weapon Drain effect on the opponent (causing their Red Energy to lose 3 points each turn) for 5 turns, +1 turn for every 6 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Inflicts the CPU Drain effect on your opponent (causing their Green Energy to lose 3 points each turn) for 5 turns, +1 turn for every 6 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Gives you the Mass Driver effect (adds +1 Mine damage for every 2 Yellow Gems in play) for 6 turns.
Gives you the Time Loop effect (25% chance of an extra turn) for 4 turns, +1 more turn for every 8 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Gives you the Solar Flare effect (matching Red, Green or Blue Gems gives you +2 Yellow Energy) for 5 turns.
Gives you the Nova effect (any Nova fills up your Energy bars) for 5 turns, +1 more turn for every 4 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Gives you the Sub-Light effect (adds +2 to all generated Energy) for 5 turns, +1 more turn for every 5 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Drains 20 Psi points from the opponent.
Drains 20 Intel Points from the opponent.
Reduces the opponents Shield by 1 point for every 2 points of Red Energy they have.
Randomly switches your opponents Energy totals. Does not end your turn.
Reduces opponent Shield by 10, +1 point for each 5 levels the opponent has. Adds those points to your own Shield.
Inflicts the Time Warp effect on the opponent (causing them to miss turns) for 2 turns, +1 turn for every 20 points of Shield Energy you have.
Inflicts the Confusion effect on the opponent (halving their Skills) for 5 turns, +1 turn for every 3 Blue Gems in play.
Does 3 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 6 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Does 6 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 4 points of Red Energy you have.
Destroys all Blue Gems in play. Drains 2 points from the opponents Shields for every Gem destroyed.
Destroys all Purple Gems, giving you 1 point of Yellow Energy for every Gem destroyed.
Destroys all White Gems, giving you 1 point of Green Energy for every Gem destroyed.
Destroys all Mines on the board, giving you 1 point of Red Energy for every Mine destroyed.
Destroys all Purple Gems, adding 1 point to your Shields for every Gem destroyed.
Adds +5 to Green Energy. Does not end your turn.
Adds +5 to Yellow Energy. Does not end your turn.
Turns all Yellow Gems into +1 Mines.
Creates 4 random +1 Mines on the board.
Turns all Blue Gems into +1 Mines.
Randomly places a single +10 Mine on the board. Does not end your turn.
Turns all lesser Mines into +3 Mines.
Turns all lesser Mines into +5 Mines.
Does 3 damage to your opponent, +1 damage for every Red Gem on the board.
Does 3 damage to your opponent, +1 damage for every 2 Green Gems on the board.
Does 5 damage to your opponent and turns all Red Gems to Blue Gems.
Does 4 damage to your opponent and destroys 3 random Gems on the board.
Gives you the Nova effect (any Nova fills up your Energy bars) for 5 turns, +1 more for every 3 Green Gems in play.
Drains your Shield but fills your Red Energy. Does not end your turn.
Inflicts your opponent with the Time Warp effect (causing them to miss their turn) for 2 turns.
Inflicts your opponent with the Time Warp effect (causing them to miss their turn) for 2 turns, +1 more for every 10 points of Red Energy you have.
Gives you the Adaptive Armor effect (20% chance to reduce incoming damage to 1 point) for 4 turns, +1 more for every 5 points of Green Energy you have.
Gives you the Conductive Armor effect (+1 to Red, Yellow, and Green Energy when taking damage) for 4 turns, +1 more for every 5 points of Yellow Energy you have.
Does 10 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 5 levels you have.
Inflicts your opponent with the Time Warp effect (causing them to miss their turn) for 2 turns, +1 more turns for every 8 points of Red Energy they have.
Does 6 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 8 points of Yellow Energy they have.
Does 9 points of damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 4 points of Red Energy you have. Your turn does not end.
Does 1 point of damage to your opponent for every 2 points of your Green Energy.
Does 19 damage to your opponent, +1 more for every 2 points of Green Energy you have.
Destroys all Purple Gems. Adds +1 to Intel for every 2 Gems destroyed.
Does 1 point of damage to your opponent for every 2 points of Red Energy they have.
Does 1 point of damage to your opponent for every 2 points of Yellow Energy they have.
Converts all Green Gems into Red Gems.
Converts all Green Gems into Yellow Gems.
Select a Gem. Changes all Gems of matching color into White Gems.
Changes all Gems of a random color into Purple Gems.
Destroys a selected Gem plus all of the Gems around it. Full effect is given for every Gem destroyed.
Drains all of your Red Energy and doubles all of your Green Energy.
Drains all of your Yellow Energy and doubles all of your Green Energy.
Does 6 points of damage to your opponent, ignoring Shields, +1 more for every 5 Red Energy you have.
Does 10 points of damage to your opponent, ignoring Shields, +1 more for every 4 points of Red Energy you have.
Destroys all Blue Gems in play. You gain no effect from the Gems. Does not end your turn.
Destroys all Blue Gems in play. Adds +1 to your Red Energy for every 2 Gems destroyed.
Destroys the selected column of Gems. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
Destroys the selected column of Gems and one column on either side. You gain full effect for every Gem destroyed.
All Gems on the board are removed and new Gems fall in to replace them.
Adds +1 point of Red Energy for every Mine on the board.
Does 5 points of Damage to the opponent, +1 point for every 2 Purple Gems in play.
Changes all Green and Red Gems into Yellow Gems.
Removes all Blue and Red Gems from play, doing 1 point of Damage to the enemy for every 2 Gems removed.
Removes all White Gems from play and increases your Shield by 4 points for every White Gem removed up to 75% of your shields.
Removes all White Gems from play, adding +1 to Shields and Hull for every 2 Gems removed.
Does 15 points of damage to the enemy.
Doubles the number of mines in play. (Max = 8)
Leeches a random Energy type from your enemy and adds it to your ship.
Halves your enemys Hull points, ignoring Shields.
Removes all Mines from play, repairing your ship by 1 point for each Mine removed.
Removes all Blue Gems from play and increases all Energy reserves to 8 below maximum levels.
Does 3 Damage to both Shields and Hull. Costs 3 PSI.
Gives 2 CPU Energy and 10% of Shields (min: 3) each turn for 6 Turns Costs 6 PSI.
Does 5 Damage to both Shields and Hull. Costs 6 PSI.
Does 9 Damage to both Shields and Hull. Costs 10 PSI.
Causes any player matching purple gems to take Hull and Shield damage. Costs 5 PSI.
Deals 3 Hull and Shield Damage per turn for 6 Turns. Costs 11 PSI.
Deals 1 Hull and Shield Damage per turn, lowers stats by 20% for 7 Turns. Costs 12 PSI. Does not end your turn.
Deals 5 Hp/Sp to user, 14 Hp/Sp to enemy and destroys purple gems. Costs 42 PSI.
Increases all max energy by 8 points. Costs 20 PSI.
Lowers enemy maximum shields by 15%. Costs 10 PSI.
Enemy takes 10~30 hull damage whenever it makes a nova for 6 + 1 turns per 8 Engine.
Reverses the effect of enemy auto-repair for 5 turns, unless discovered. (Max: -7)
Sets both ships' auto-repair to 0 for 5 turns + 1 per 5 CPU.
Overheats enemy weapon systems, lowering gunnery to 10% but will slowly recover. Does not end your turn.
Lowers enemy Engineer by 65% for 5 Turns - Also may cause high levels of fuel to leak.
Hits enemy 1~3 Times based on ship size. Deals 6 Damage and 6 Energy loss per hit.
Increases Pilot by ~50%, Decreases Science by ~50% for 10 turns. Affected by Ship Size.
Increases damage when matching mines by 2~9 based on ship size for 3~4T. Cancels with hull damage. Your turn does not end.
Increases damage when matching mines by 5~12 based on ship size for 5T. Cancels with hull damage.
Gives a chance for small ships to deal 150% damage. Lasts 5T + 1 per 5 CPU which it drains.

Reduce incoming damage by 75% on small ships ~30% of the time for ~7 Turns.
*Density Field Increases the engine gained by small ships and decreases it for large ones for 8 Turns.
*Impervious Shielding Grants temporary invincibility to small ships. Exhausts shields.
Basic Ion Laser Deals 5 Ion Damage to your enemy + 1 for every 5 Red Energy that you have.
Adv Ion Laser Deals 7 Ion Damage to your enemy + 1 for every 4 Red Energy that you have.
Military Ion Laser Deals 9 Ion Damage to your enemy + 1 for every 3 Red Energy that you have.
Ion Beam Cannon Deals 17 Ion Damage to your enemy + 1 for every 4 Red or Green Energy that you have.
*Molecular Spasm Causes energy loss to both ships, deals damage to enemy. Effects are mitigated by high levels of Science.
Hull Patch Passively Adds 5 to Hull.
Layered Armor Passively Adds 15 to Hull.
Reinforced Armor Passively Adds 20 to Hull.
Digital Armor Passively Adds 20 to Hull + 1 per 20 Points of Science you have. Only fits size 3~4 Ships.
Fission Armor Passively Adds 25 to Hull + 1 per 20 Points of Engineer you have. Only fits size 3~4 Ships.
PSI Augmenter Passively Increases the PSI you gain per Purple Match by 1.
Energy Matches Doubled Mine Damage Doubled
